comment_text: Freedom of religion also includes those who do not believe in anything, including a god. God has no place in any government funded organization.  I do not care where we came from, or where I go when I die. I am only good for the sake of being good. By leaving under god in the pledge our children are hearing a phrase which is not true in any form. No one is under god since there is no proof one exist. It is a pointless addition to the pledge, which is otherwise a statement our children are taught at a very early age. I refused to say the pledge completely because of the under god phrase, and I was left alone because no one wanted to battle with my Atheist father.
